code: import{createContext,useContext,useState,useEffect}from"react";import{FetchMealByFirstLetter,SearchMealByName,FetchMealById}from"./mealtService";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const RecipesContext=/*#__PURE__*/createContext();export const RecipesProvider=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const[recipes,setRecipes]=useState([]);const[mealDetails,setMealDetails]=useState(null);const searchRecipes=async name=>{const results=await SearchMealByName(name);if(results){setRecipes(results);}else{setRecipes([]);}};const loadRecipes=async()=>{const results=await FetchMealByFirstLetter();if(results){setRecipes(results);}};const fetchMealDetails=async id=>{const meal=await FetchMealById(id);if(meal){setMealDetails(meal);}else{setMealDetails(null);}};useEffect(()=>{loadRecipes();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RecipesContext.Provider,{value:{recipes,searchRecipes,loadRecipes,mealDetails,fetchMealDetails},children:children});};export const useRecipeContext=()=>{return useContext(RecipesContext);};
